actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade

official_title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to allow gifts to be exported under a general license.

summary.text: Amends the Export Administration Act of 1979 to direct the Secretary of Commerce to permit the export, under a general license, to any destination of any gift parcel, subject to the appropriate conditions, except that the Secretary may not impose a restriction of less than $400 in a domestic retail value for each such gift parcel.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to allow gifts to be exported under a general license.
